title: Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device , ImageData)
description: Bug 44164: An update is needed in the javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData). The code snippet provided demonstrates the usage of this constructor in the TestImageInvalidImage class. The image.dispose() method is currently commented out.
OB: The javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData) does not provide sufficient information about its usage.
EB: This information should be added to the javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData).
SR: Update the javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData) to include details on how to properly use it and emphasize the importance of disposing the image afterwards to avoid resource leaks.
